title: Quote Request Details
description: Captures different details of a quote request process for various types of quotes - including insurance policies, healthcare, manufacturing orders, or high tech orders.

xdm:discount.title: Discount
xdm:discount.description: Records the discount amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

xdm:premium.title: Premium
xdm:premium.description: Records the premium amount for a quote displayed to a visitor.

xdm:location.title: Location
xdm:location.description: Captures the postal code used for finding retailers near the visitor's location.

xdm:personalDetails.title: Personal Details
xdm:personalDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

xdm:selectedRetailer.title: Selected Retailer
xdm:selectedRetailer.description: Captures the selected retailer for a quote request, if applicable.
